name: IntentQL Demo Store
description: Shopify store demonstrating agent contract discovery via IntentQL

gateway.note: All intents execute through this gateway. Shopify API is not called directly.

intents.name: List Products
intents.description: Fetch all available products from the catalog
intents.returns: JSON with product array including id, title, handle, price

rules: Only intents explicitly listed above are supported
Do not attempt to access Shopify APIs directly
Do not assume cart, checkout, or purchase capabilities exist
Do not attempt to access customer or order data
Do not invent endpoints not declared in this contract
If an intent is marked 'planned', it is not yet functional
